mapper.select: SELECT * FROM follow WHERE fol_user_id = #{folUserId} AND target_user_id = #{targetUserId}
SELECT f.follow_no, f.fol_user_id , f.target_user_id, f.is_following, u.nickname, u.profile_img FROM follow f, users u WHERE f.fol_user_id=#{searchKeyword} AND u.user_id = f.target_user_id
SELECT f.follow_no, f.fol_user_id , f.target_user_id, f.is_following, u.nickname, u.profile_img FROM follow f, users u WHERE f.target_user_id=#{searchKeyword} AND f.fol_user_id = u.user_id

SELECT a.fol_user_id, a.target_user_id, f.follow_no, f.fol_user_id , f.target_user_id, f.is_following, u.nickname, u.profile_img FROM follow f, users u, ( select follow_no, fol_user_id, target_user_id from follow where fol_user_id=#{searchKeyword}) a WHERE f.target_user_id=#{searchKeyword} AND f.fol_user_id = u.user_id and a.target_user_id = f.fol_user_id
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM follow WHERE fol_user_id=#{folUserId} AND target_user_id = #{targetUserId}
